titles.title: To amend the Export Apple Act to permit the export of apples to Canada in bulk bins without certification by the Department of Agriculture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture.

committee.subcommittee: Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 3/20/2013--Introduced. Amends the Export Apple Act to permit apples to be exported to Canada in bulk bins (a quantity of apples weighing more than 100 pounds) without complying with certain inspection and certification requirements.
